Articles.Content:
HOORAY!

Mouse over the Altitude indicator when stopped and it slides back to reveal.... A RECOVER BUTTON!

So glad. Now we won't have to go back and forth between flight and Tracking Station!
A significant improvement of usability. Seriously, no sarcasm, no kidding. It is really done by KISS - "keep it simple and stupid" - principle at the right place.

A significant improvement of usability. Seriously, no sarcasm, no kidding. It is really done by KISS - "keep it simple and stupid" - principle at the right place.

It's the little things.
